actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A bill to make available funds under the Mutual Educational and Cultural Exchange Act of 1961 to provide Fulbright scholarships for Cuban nationals to undertake graduate study in the social sciences.

summary.text: Authorizes the President to provide Fulbright scholarships for Cuban nationals for graduate study in public health, public policy, economics, law, or other field of social science, under the Mutual Educational and Cultural Exchange Act of 1961. Prohibits Cuban Government officials, or members of their immediate families, from being eligible for such scholarships. Provides that such scholarship-making authority supercedes any existing law. Makes specified amounts under such Act in FY 2000 through 2004 available for such scholarships, for up to 20 scholarships in FY 2000, 25 in FY 2001, and 35 in each of FY 2002 through 2004.

titles.title: A bill to make available funds under the Mutual Educational and Cultural Exchange Act of 1961 to provide Fulbright scholarships for Cuban nationals to undertake graduate study in the social sciences.
